lines: 1. E Kalwari - Jawar notho,E kanyono, Jawar nogur;E wi yadhno, Rembe nochwer,Kendo nokawo chandruokna.
E Kalwari kanyo molil,Kama Remb Yesu nochwerna;E Kalwari manogwedhi,Kanyo Jawarna nothona.
2. E dier luanda - Polo dudo,Chuny Jawarna, nochot kanyo;Law ma noyiech, nosiemo yo,Madhi e mor ma ok norum.
3. O Yesu Ruoth - Nobed nade!Nichiwo ngimani ni an;Mar ting`o chuat, Msalaba,E saa malich, E Kalwari.
